title: Casa Leña: Amazon Storefront
description: Designed a compliant storefront aligned and approved with Amazon's brand and layout requirements — streamlining approval and extending the brand experience from packaging to platform.

title: Kokoro: BARF Diet Calculator & Site
description: Built a conversion-focused digital flow that turned pet diet calculations into WhatsApp orders — increasing direct engagement and minimizing customer onboarding time.

title: Energy (CFE): Internal IoT Monitoring Tool
description: Redesigned a utility dashboard for energy technicians — improving data interpretation speed and reducing time-to-decision in the field.

title: Energy: Smart Monitoring for CFE
description: UX/UI design for an internal webapp that visualizes energy consumption data from SPORE-enabled meters — streamlining operations at a national level.

title: Compárale: Mortgage Credit App
description: Designed UX/UI for a digital mortgage tool used for 5+ years — improving clarity for applicants and streamlining form completion across devices.

title: Getabed: Hotel Booking Engine
description: Designed and implemented the UI and flow of a hotel booking system still in use today — reducing friction in reservations through intuitive dashboard layout.

title: Giloco — Shopify eCommerce Site
description: Developed a ready-to-launch online store using Shopify — extending the brand into digital with a lightweight structure that minimized setup and maintenance time.
